name: iSubs
description:
"A nuclear war can ruin your whole day!"

It's the year 2060. A nuclear war has broken out.
6 major superpowers fight for victory. Take control
of North America and save your citizens!

- Conquer seas of the world and capture nuclear reactors
- Send bombers to support your submarines
- Protect your cities from nuclear threat
- Upgrade your subs

Features:

- real time wargame
- 5 strong A.I opponents
- 3 difficulty levels
- 60 cities
- up to 1000 units simultaneously!
- extra wide world map
